author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chegg Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.02
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Chegg Inc:
* CHEGG REPORTS Q1 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND RAISES FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q1 REVENUE $76.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $74.2 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $69 MILLION TO $71 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN THE RANGE OF $30 MILLION TO $35 MILLION
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IN RANGE OF $77 MILLION TO $79 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IN RANGE OF $17 MILLION TO $18.5 MILLION
* SEES 2018 CHEGG SERVICES REVENUES IN RANGE OF $243 MILLION TO $246 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 CHEGG SERVICES REVENUES IN RANGE OF $58 MILLION TO $60 MILLION
* QTRLY NET LOSS PER SHARE, $0.02 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.09 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY NON-GAAP NET INCOME WAS $12.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon:
